name: Wild West Lobo
description: Wild West Wolf is a tribute game made for my love for the wild west. My last name Lobo translates to "Wolf" in Spanish. The player plays as a Mexican Wolf, a species that belongs to the Gray wolf family and also one of the most enangered wolves in all of North America. I hoped to inspire and educate some people of the perils the Mexican Wolf faces as a consequence of trapping and hunting.
